questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Cluster Architecture, Installation & Configuration (Domain 1)?
options: Control Plane Components (API Server, etcd, Scheduler, Controller Manager)
questions.explanation: Cluster Upgrade with kubeadm is a key concept in Cluster Architecture, Installation & Configuration. This domain covers topics essential for the Kubernetes CKA exam.

questions.question: A professional is tasked with use kubeadm to install a basic cluster. What should be the first step?
options: Assess the current state and identify requirements
Document the findings in a report
questions.explanation: The first step in any cluster architecture, installation & configuration task is to assess the current state before implementing changes.

questions.question: Which concept in Cluster Architecture, Installation & Configuration is most closely related to manage a highly-available kubernetes cluster?

Cluster Architecture, Installation & Configuration implementation and operations

Cluster Architecture, Installation & Configuration risk management
questions.explanation: Manage a highly-available Kubernetes cluster falls under the implementation and operations aspect of Cluster Architecture, Installation & Configuration.
